entry.title: CIA Blocked IRS from Investigating Hunter Biden Patron Kevin Morris, Whistleblower Claims
entry.summary: IRS whistleblower Gary Shapley testified that the prosecutor on the case canceled an interview with Morris after receiving a CIA briefing.

entry.title: Princeton Faculty Vote to Grant Amnesty to Pro-Palestinian Protesters
entry.summary: In late April, 13 people were arrested at Princeton University after occupying the Clio Hall building for a pro-Palestinian demonstration.

entry.title: Hunter Biden Whistleblowers Ask Judge to Dismiss His Lawsuit against IRS
entry.summary: The whistleblowers argued the case should be dismissed because their disclosures are legally protected.

entry.title: Harvard Prevents Twelve Anti-Israel Protesters from Graduating at Commencement
entry.summary: The university is suspending five students and placing over 20 of them on probation for participating in an anti-Israel encampment.

entry.title: The Homelessness Discussion Is Overlooking an Obvious Solution
entry.summary: Neither strict nor lenient laws will end homelessness. But a systematic and community-wide focus on homelessness-prevention measures just might.

entry.summary: Contrary to popular perception, the medieval papacy challenged the Jew-hatred of its day, in a way Catholics can derive inspiration from today.

The nurses clustered around it, amazed. â€œThe West has everything!â€ they said. 1979å¹´ï¼Œæˆ‘æ¯äº²åœ¨å—äº¬çš„ä¸€å®¶åŒ»é™¢é‡Œæ‹¿å‡ºäº†ä¸€å¼ åˆ›å¯è´´ã€‚æŠ¤å£«ä»¬å›´ç€å®ƒï¼Œèµå¹ä¸å·²ã€‚å¥¹ä»¬è¯´ï¼šâ€œè¥¿æ–¹ä»€ä¹ˆéƒ½æœ‰ï¼â€ We were on a family visit to China, where my Shanghai relatives were similarly wowed by our excellent teeth and ample body fat, not to mention our descriptions of American dishwashers, refrigerators and air-conditioning. entry.summary: The ongoing anti-Israel encampment at GW began on Thursday, and the university said it notified multiple students of their interim suspensions on Friday.

entry.title: U.S. Intelligence Agencies Find Putin Didnâ€™t Order Navalnyâ€™s Death: Report
entry.summary: Navalny, Putinâ€™s fiercest critic, died in February at age 47 after dedicating his life to exposing the authoritarian abuses of the Putin regime.

entry.title: Columbia Creates Task Force to Investigate University Administration as Pro-Palestinian Protests Roil Campus
entry.summary: In a separate decision, Columbia banned a student leader who helped set up a pro-Palestinian encampment on campus.
